mapper.insert: insert ignore into archive_exam_attend_log(id,user_id,exam_id,join_time,quit_time,status,score,is_correcting,create_time,update_time) select id,user_id,exam_id,join_time,quit_time,status,score,is_correcting,create_time,update_time from exam_attend_log where create_time between date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) and curdate()
mapper.select: select user_id, (select username from sys_user t1 where t1.id = user_id) as userNumber, (select real_name from sys_user t1 where t1.id = user_id) as userName, exam_id, join_time,quit_time, status, score, is_correcting from archive_exam_attend_log where exam_id = #{examId}
